about_the_game:
This official soundtrack captures the mysterious world of Escape Simulator.
It comes in regular MP3, and high-definition WAV format and totals 42 minutes of beautifully crafted music by the composer Saša Dukić.
Let the sounds take you on a trip through ancient Egypt, a mysterious Victorian mansion, and all the way to outer space. Enjoy relaxing sounds and support our work!

name: Escape Simulator Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 550 MB available space
